steps.title: The ğŸª¼ emoji was added to Emoji 15.0 in 2022.
steps.content: The ğŸª¼ emoji was added to Emoji 15.0 in 2022. It was first revealed on World Emoji Day (July 17) of the same year, but it was officially approved as part of Unicode 15.0 on September 13, 2022.
